values.desc: If javax.xml.transform.TransformerFactory#getFeature returns true when passed this value as an argument, the Transformer supports Source input of this type.

values.ctor:
<init>(inputStream: InputStream!)
            Construct a StreamSource from a byte stream.

<init>(inputStream: InputStream!, systemId: String!)
            Construct a StreamSource from a byte stream.

<init>(reader: Reader!)
            Construct a StreamSource from a character reader.

<init>(reader: Reader!, systemId: String!)
            Construct a StreamSource from a character reader.

<init>(systemId: String!)
            Construct a StreamSource from a URL.

<init>(f: File!)
            Construct a StreamSource from a File.

values.desc: Get the byte stream that was set with setByteStream.
Get the public identifier that was set with setPublicId.
Get the character stream that was set with setReader.
Get the system identifier that was set with setSystemId.
Set the byte stream to be used as input.
Set the public identifier for this Source.
Set the input to be a character reader.
Set the system identifier for this Source.
Set the system ID from a File reference.
